highlight_hidden_until_found.name: `hidden="until-found"`
highlight_hidden_until_found.description: Hide an element until it is found (e.g. via a find-in-page search or when targeted by the URL hash).
highlight_hidden_until_found.descriptionHtml: Hide an element until it is found (e.g. via a find-in-page search or when targeted by the URL hash).
highlight_hidden_until_found.descriptionClean: Hide an element until it is found (e.g. via a find-in-page search or when targeted by the URL hash).

example.codeHighlighted: <section class="drawer" aria-expanded="false" hidden="until-found"> <!-- content --> </section>

resources.title: Making collapsed content accessible with hidden=until-found

webFeature.description_html: The hidden="until-found" attribute hides an element until it is found using the browser's find-in-page search or it is directly navigated to by following a URL fragment.
webFeature.name: hidden="until-found"
